Anders Carlsson

Anders Carlsson was born on the 9th of December, 1780 to Carl Staffenson and Anna Hansdotter in Sireköpinge parish, Malmöhus county (2. Sometime before 1815 he was living in Tirup parish before he moved back to Sireköpinge in 1815 and married Karna Hindriksdotter on July 9, 1815 (1A, 3). The two lived in Sireköpinge No. 4, Sireköpinge parish for the rest of their lives where their daughter, Boel Andersdotter, was born on the 30th of April, 1824 (1D). Anders passed away on the 31st of December, 1842 at the age of 62 (1F, 4.
